title: Brain Bonus: Magic Brain
description: In time for your Friday commute, we introduce you to a new segment called Magic Brain. Shankar explores the social science behind magic, and discovers that free choice is sometimes just an illusion.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
